content: Yes, staying informed and engaged is key to being prepared for the future. While change can be exciting and bring about positive transformations, it can also be unsettling and disruptive. However, history has shown that people have the capacity to adapt to new situations and conditions, and often, this adaptability leads to progress and new opportunities. So, it may be useful to view change as a natural part of human evolution that can lead to growth and development, rather than something to be feared. In any case, being prepared and informed can help us navigate uncertain times and take advantage of emerging opportunities.
